long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Task12 is your all-in-one task management solution, built directly into your browser for ultimate convenience. Whether it's organizing work tasks, saving important web articles, or keeping track of shopping lists, Task12 allows you to manage everything seamlessly.

Here‚Äôs what Task12 can do for you:

üìå Add Websites as Tasks
Turn any webpage into a task with just a click. Found an article you want to read later? A product to buy? Or a resource you need to review? Simply save it as a task in Task12 and come back to it when you're ready.

üóÇÔ∏è Plan Your Day
Quickly organize and prioritize your tasks for the day. Drag and drop tasks to reorder them based on urgency or category. Task12 helps you stay focused by allowing you to curate your daily to-do list effortlessly.

‚úÖ Complete Tasks Without Leaving Your Browser
As you finish each task, check it off directly from the extension‚Äîno need to leave your browser or switch between apps. Task12 keeps you productive by allowing you to manage everything in one place.

‚è≥ Automatic Task Expiration (12 Hours)
Each task you create will automatically expire after 12 hours, encouraging you to stay on track and preventing your task list from becoming cluttered. Missed a task? No worries‚Äîexpired tasks can easily be re-added if needed.

üîó Efficient Web-Based Task Management
Say goodbye to using multiple apps or jotting down notes elsewhere. With Task12, your tasks are tied directly to the websites you visit, keeping all your important tasks at your fingertips, right within your browser.

Task12 is the perfect productivity tool for anyone who wants to efficiently manage their time online, stay organized, and ensure nothing falls through the gaps.
